languages.text: Однако в хрониках есть упоминания некоего Вакемо, абордажника, служившего под началом неизвестного Вольного Торговца.
Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Однако в хрониках есть упоминания некоего Вакемо, абордажника, служившего под началом неизвестного Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder, who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.
Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder, who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.
Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder, who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.
Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder, who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.
Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.
Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 不过，编年史上提到，有个名叫“弗拉魔”的虚空之子，为某个身份不明的行商浪人服务。
languages.original_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 不过，编年史上提到，有个名叫“弗拉魔”的虚空之子，为某个身份不明的行商浪人服务。

languages.text: Wobei die Chroniken einen gewissen Vackemo erwähnen, einen Entersoldaten, der unter einem unbekannten Freihändler gedient hat.
languages.original_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Wobei die Chroniken einen gewissen Vackemo erwähnen, einen Entersoldaten, der unter einem unbekannten Freihändler gedient hat.

languages.text: Cependant, les chroniques font mention d'un nommé Vackemo, un abordeur qui servit sous {mf|un libre-marchand inconnu|une libre-marchande inconnue}.
languages.original_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, les chroniques font mention d'un nommé Vackemo, un abordeur qui servit sous {mf|un libre-marchand inconnu|une libre-marchande inconnue}.

languages.text: Aunque las crónicas mencionan a un tal Vackemo, huésped de un Comerciante Independiente desconocido.
languages.original_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Aunque las crónicas mencionan a un tal Vackemo, huésped de un Comerciante Independiente desconocido.

languages.text: とはいえ、年代記には無名の一名のヴァッケモが乗船者として記されており、それは自由開拓者に仕えていたという。
languages.original_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: とはいえ、年代記には無名の一名のヴァッケモが乗船者として記されており、それは自由開拓者に仕えていたという。

languages.text: Vakayinamelerde ise bilinmeyen bir Hür Tacir'in hizmetindeki Vackemo adlı bir bordacının adı geçiyor.
languages.original_text: Though the chronicles mention one Vackemo, a boarder who served under an unknown Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Gerçi vakayinamelerde, bilinmeyen bir Hür Tacir'in hizmetindeki Vackemo adında bir bordalama askerinden söz edilmekte.
